text: Prayapoorthi Aayavarkku Mathram is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Suresh Heblicker, starring Innocent and Silk Smitha in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/film_prayapoorthi-aayavarkku-mathram-.htm ==Cast== * Innocent * Kuthiravattam Pappu * Silk Smitha ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Prayapoorthi Aayavarkku Mathram
